task.title: Pancakes Recipe
task.shortdesc: These pancakes can be paired with toppings of your choice, such as fruit.

taskbody.prereq:
Materials for this recipe include a measuring cup, a mixing bowl, a skillet, and a stovetop. The ingredients are as follows:
1¼ cups of all-purpose flour
1½ cups of all-purpose flour
2 tablespoons of white sugar
2 teaspoons of baking powder
3½ teaspoons of baking powder
½ teaspoon of salt
1 teaspoon of salt
¼ cups of water
1 tablespoon of coconut oil
1 tablespoon of white sugar
1¼ cups of milk
1 egg
3 tablespoons of butter, melted
maple syrup

step.cmd: Sift the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt into a large bowl.
With the exception of the oil, pour the rest of the ingredients into the bowl, and stir until blended.
Heat a lightly oiled skillet over medium-high heat.
Pour the batter onto the skillet, making the size of the pancake to your preference.
Cook until bubbles form and the edges are dry.
Flip, and cook until lightly browned on the other side.
Top the pancakes with fruits of your choice, or just pour some maple syrup on top, and enjoy!
